Title: BFG and Dice Roller
Description: This solution will contain 2 concepts, the Dice Roller with hooks for extension into other applications, as well as a Personal Battlefleet Gothic Helper application to help manage, control, and smoothe the flow of BFG games.  The BFG application will target the Phone 7 platform.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This solution will contain 2 concepts, the Dice Roller with hooks for extension into other applications, as well as a Personal Battlefleet Gothic Helper application to help manage, control, and smooth the flow of BFG games. The BFG application will target the Phone 7 platform.
